question.text5: Part I: Determining Strategies and Response Plan
question.questiontext:
The stay time of 42 seconds within 2 ft of the source is not adequate to perform the surveys that are required, without exceeding the dose limit set on the team's EPDs.

Which of the following are appropriate actions to take to increase the stay time?

options.option: Shield the Cs-137 to reduce the dose rate
Don't do a characterization survey in the room
Increase the survey team's dose limit to 25 REM
Increase the survey team's dose limit to 2.5 REM
Wait for the consultation team to arrive before entering
